DOC.brief_summary: - To investigate the effect of catecholamine excess on brown fat. - To evaluate the effect of brown fat on energy expenditure and lipid and glucose metabolism
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Chronic Catecholamine Overproduction on Brown Adipose Tissue
DOC.criteria: 10 patients with pheochromocytoma 5 patients with incidentaloma without hormone production Age > 18 years None
